attributes.action: give urgent consideration to the plight of the people of Burundi after floods in 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Burundi is facing a catastrophic situation.  Floods have left at least 23,000 homeless and devastated up to 80% of the harvest.  7 provinces have been declared disaster zones by the government. They need our help to recover and we the undersigned urge you to underpin our individual efforts from school children and churches in Malvern with aid from the UK government and every assistance to the government and people of Burundi.
